Footer.Description: Alphaz TV+ is a website made by fans with the objective to gather and share the work of XG. All content in the website respect the copyright ownership from XGALX.

Realities.XG Three Meals a Day: The girls need to prepare three meals every day. To do this, every morning they must take part in a challenge that will determine the ingredients they will have available for the rest of the day.
Realities.X OR GO: The girls take part in challenges that will determine the experiences each of them will have to go through on this journey through the countryside of South Korea.

Series.XTRA XTRA: A nine-episode documentary that follows the creation of XG, from the selection process to training, rehearsals, and internal conflicts.
